query:
INSERT INTO votes (post_id, comment_id, user_id, value) 
                    SELECT $1, $2, $3, $4
                    WHERE NOT EXISTS (
                        SELECT * FROM user_bans b
                        JOIN spheres s ON s.sphere_id = b.sphere_id
                        JOIN posts p ON p.sphere_id = s.sphere_id
                        WHERE p.post_id = $1 AND b.user_id = $3
                    ) RETURNING *
